IRPact_modellierung.agents.posAgents

Class POSAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.SimulationEntity
      • IRPact_modellierung.agents.Agent
        • IRPact_modellierung.agents.SpatialAgent
          • IRPact_modellierung.agents.SpatialInformationAgent
            • IRPact_modellierung.agents.posAgents.POSAgent

  • public class POSAgent
extends SpatialInformationAgent
    POS agents represent actors that are encountered / manage a point-of-sale. They are intermediates between CompanyAgents and ConsumerAgents that serve to provide products to ConsumerAgents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • POSAgent

        public POSAgent(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                java.awt.geom.Point2D coordinates,
                double informationAuthority,
                java.util.Map<Product,java.lang.Boolean> productAvailability,
                java.util.Map<Product,java.lang.Double> productPriceFactor)
        Initializes a point-of-sales agent
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container of the simulation the POS agent shall be part of
        coordinates - The position the POSagent is initialized with
        informationAuthority - The authority information stemming from this agent has
        productAvailability - A map describing which products are available at the POS agent at initialization time
        productPriceFactor - A map describing the (relative) price of the respective products
